# Project Overview

This project is a frontend application built using Astro and Tailwind CSS. It serves as the landing page for Suit Software, providing information about the company's services and products.

The company aims to deliver high-quality software solutions with a focus on user experience and modern design principles. 

We offer a range of services including: 
- web development.
- mobile app development.
- UI/UX design, tailored to meet the needs of our clients.
- AWS consulting and cloud solutions.

## Folder Structure

- `/src`: Contains the source code for the frontend.


## Libraries and Frameworks

- Astro and Tailwind CSS for the frontend.


## Coding Standards

- Use semicolons at the end of each statement.
- Use single quotes for strings.
- Use function based components in React.
- Use arrow functions for callbacks.

## UI guidelines

- A toggle is provided to switch between light and dark mode.
- Application should have a modern and clean design.
